derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, via ecclesiastical Latin alleluia from Greek allēlouia (in the Septuagint), or (from the 16th century) directly from Hebrew hallĕlūyāh 'praise ye the Lord'

encyclopedia.content: Leonard Cohen创作歌曲创作信息 《Hallelujah》为加拿大著名游吟诗人、民谣歌手Leonard Cohen在1985年创作的歌曲，收录在其专辑《Various Positions》中。其歌词充满诗意，内涵丰富，曲调缓慢忧伤，加上Leonard沧桑嗓音的低吟浅唱，演绎出了一种清淡而悠长的回味。Jeff Buckley翻唱版本 《Hallelujah》的版本很多，其中最有影响力的还是美国著名创作型歌手Jeff Buckley的翻唱版本，被收录在其1994年的专辑《Grace》中。Jeff被U2的

entry.tran: 哈利路亚（用于宗教唱诵和祷词中，意为赞美和感谢上帝）
entry.def: Hallelujah is used in religious songs and worship as an exclamation of praise and thanks to God.

entry.tran: 哈利路亚！（对期望已久的事发生表示高兴）
entry.def: People sometimes say 'Hallelujah!' when they are pleased that something they have been waiting a long time for has finally happened.

means.word_mean: 1. a shout or song of praise to God
